wikipedia_page.main:
Alex Latta (1 September 1867 – 25 August 1928) was a Scottish footballer who made ten appearances, mostly at outside right, in Everton's Football League title winning side of 1890/91.
Latta began his career with Dumbarton Athletic F.C. as a 14-year-old but moved to Everton F.C. in 1889. He was a tall and stocky outside right who displayed great pace and dribbling skills. Latta played twice for Scotland during his career. His debut came in the 5–1 defeat of Wales on 10 March 1888. Latta scored two goals.

response: * 1 September – Alex Latta (d. 1928), Scotland international in two matches, scoring two goals (1888–1889).
* Alex Latta – 1896 (Did not make a senior appearance for Liverpool)
